name: ccloud-nodejs-client
description: A Node.js application that subscribes to a topic on a Confluent Cloud Kafka cluster, sends a sample message, and consumes it.

scripts.test-sms: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/test-sms.ts
scripts.test-sms-producer: NODE_OPTIONS='--import=data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' node src/test-sms-producer.ts
